Package ulb.infof307.g9.controller.mods.study

Class CardController

java.lang.Object
ulb.infof307.g9.controller.abstracts.Controller
ulb.infof307.g9.controller.mods.study.CardController
All Implemented Interfaces:
CardView.Listener
Direct Known Subclasses:
HoleCardController, MultiChoiceCardController, StandardCardController
public abstract class CardController extends Controller implements CardView.Listener
Controller for the CardView. This controller is used to display the card sides and manages the text to speech feature.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static interface 
    CardController.Listener
    Interface used by the upper controller to listen to events from this controller

    • getQuestionSideText

      protected abstract String getQuestionSideText()
      Gets the text to be displayed for the question side of the card. Needs to be implemented by the child class.

    • getAnswerSideText

      protected abstract String getAnswerSideText()
      Gets the text to be displayed for the answer side of the card. Needs to be implemented by the child class.
